title: PINK FLOYD 1973 - 1982  AC3 5.1 Surround
description:
THERE IS AN UPDATED VERSION OF THIS TORRENT CALLED

PINK FLOYD - 1973 to 1983 AC3 5.1 SURROUND

                    ""INFORMATION ABOUT THESE DISCS""

First of all this is not a SACAD format so you DO NOT NEED ANY SPECIAL
   BULLSHIT EQUIPMENT to play this
it is in dvd form for you to burn with DVD Shrink or the like..
Or it's in .ISO   Either way it's
in surround sound format in DVD exactly the same as the dvd movies
you buy from a shop
has a menu for seperate Album and/or Song select via the menu button..
On some disc it will display

Example...   "album 1/3 or Song 1/4 to View use ACROSS not   
  Next to view the other Pages..  1 page usually
   consists of around 9 give or take albums same applies for songs
     this is only a guide each disc is different"  Say like this disc here has only
      1 page for albums and for each has 1 page for songs.
       Except the wall and the final cut which will have several, because its longer
  On your screen you will have a back ground picture
   and written on it will be.. song name, album name and band name...

Will auto play from the first song on The Disc.. Enjoy....
It's just like a C.D all songs are Separate no matter what album if there is several and you pick a certain song it will play it and then so on..  

Yes It is in DVD format for PAL.. Not that it matters that much since most DVD players play Both (PAL - NTSC)
There are programs like DVD clone to convert to NTSC if needed

   
Remember Your Recording is only as good as the BLANKS and SPEED you set and choose!!


The AC3 i use is "Dolby LFE" 2 front, 1 centre, 2 surround and 1 low freq.. 
there all set at +0 so it's up to you to fiddle around with the sound levels 
On your Stereo or whatever you use.
Will play with standard 2 speakers just like a factory DVD.


SEED IT! or its gone forever...

Also Seeding other AC3 5.1s and MP3.. just click on my name

i was originally using the bit rate of 640kbps but found a lot of dvd players
were going mental so i dropped down to 448kbps which is standard for all players 
                <<SO THE SOUND IS EQUAL TO A DVD VIDEO>>  

From the Bubanee, Mumlith, Dadanee, Sissy, Boranee, Roxynee and The Sha Sha
